title: Nag' el-Scheima
description: Christian settlement on the Nile protected by defensive walls and a fortress and featuring churches and a cemetery probably dating until the 5th century CE. The site was flooded by the High Aswan Dam.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Nag' el-Scheima after Bietak 1987.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Nag' el-Scheima
